name: Mind the Gap (CrispyPin)
description:
Mind the gap!

This game was made for Ludum Dare 45.

Bridge your way to victory in this puzzle platformer! Features 6 levels with an extra challenge in the form of a star hidden somewhere in each level.

This was my first solo jam, hope you enjoy!

Controls:
  • WAD or Arrow keys to move
  • Left Click or Space to create bridges
  • Right Click or Shift to remove bridges
